name: FetchFaxMedia
description: Fetch a specific fax media instance.

FaxSid.description: The SID of the fax with the FaxMedia resource to fetch.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the FaxMedia resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the Account that created the resource
**content_type**: The content type of the stored fax media
**date_created**: The ISO 8601 date and time in GMT when the resource was created
**date_updated**: The ISO 8601 date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated
**fax_sid**: The SID of the fax the FaxMedia resource is associated with
**sid**: The unique string that identifies the resource
**url**: The absolute URL of the FaxMedia resource
